meanings.definition: To install wiring in a building before the walls are finished.
meanings.sent1: The electricians will prewire the house before the drywall goes up.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to prewire a new construction for electrical outlets.
meanings.sent3: Why did the builders prewire the entire building with colorful wires?
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to prewire every room with thoughts before speaking.
meanings.sent5: The idea to prewire the system for success was like planting seeds of achievement.

meanings.definition: The act of installing wiring in advance of finishing the walls.
meanings.sent1: The prewire of the house was completed efficiently by the electricians.
meanings.sent2: A thorough prewire can save time during the final stages of construction.
meanings.sent3: The prewire of the building was so neat and organized, it looked like art.
meanings.sent4: The prewire of connections between people can lead to strong relationships.
meanings.sent5: The prewire of the system was like setting up a network of communication pathways.
